name: Mark After Dark
description: Mark really needs to get laid. Will you give him a happy ending?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher resolution desktop DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM
